T02TD1278E:130a-0: @130a * // chos spyod mdor bsdus pa'i bya ba bzhugs so //
T02TD1278E:130a-2: # // dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1278E:130a-3: 'di'i lam du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang por lhan cig skyes pa'i bde pa'i dang du nyal nas /
T02TD1278E:130b-0: nang par tho rangs khar tshad med pa'i lha mo bzhis tshad med pa'i glus bskul nas langs te khrus byas nas nang du @130b gnas te /
T02TD1278E:130b-1: bdud rtsi dang pa'i rnam lngas sems dang bas mandala legs par byas te byug pa bya zhing /
T02TD1278E:130b-2: ngag tu badzra re khe h'um zhes byas pas sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD1278E:130b-3: de nas me tog gcig mandala gyi dbus su gzhag / srung ba'i phur bu stod khro bo smad phur pa gcig tu bsams la bsrung ngo //
T02TD1278E:130b-4: me tog gcig rang gi mgor bzhag nas lus bsrungs pa dang de nas lag pa bkrus nas /
T02TD1278E:130b-5: aom de ba pe tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1278E:130b-6: zhes pas me tog gcig dbus su bzhag pas gtso bo yab yum du bskyed /
T02TD1278E:130b-7: shar du go bo r'i na ma: zhes pas me tog gcig gzhag / de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang shar lho lho nub nub byang dang byang shar mtshams su rim pa bzhin du /
T02TD1278E:130b-10: ghasma r'i na ma: pukka s'i na ma:/
T02TD1278E:130b-13: do mbi n'i na ma:/ zhes pas me tog dgram pa dang /
T02TD1278E:130b-14: der lha mo re re mos pa tsam gyis bskyed de /
T02TD1278E:130b-15: mchod pa rim pa bzhin du bshams nas /
T02TD1278E:130b-16: bris sku la sogs pa legs par bkram nas /
T02TD1278E:130b-17: stan bde ba la sogs par 'dug ste /
T02TD1278E:130b-18: rang nyid mos pa'i lhar bsams pa'i snying gar /
T02TD1278E:130b-19: pam las padma dang ram las nyi ma'i steng du h'um sngon po bsams la /
T02TD1278E:130b-20: lus kyis rdo rje dril bu gzung /
T02TD1278E:130b-21: ngag tu aom he badzra aa dhi shtha na raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1278E:130b-22: zhes brjod pas sems kyis h'um las 'od zer 'phros pas thams cad rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02TD1278E:130b-25: gur du bsams la aom he badzra la gong gi sngags raksha la sogs pa sbyar /
T02TD1278E:130b-26: bsam phas lus thams cad rdo rje'i rnam par bya ba dang /
T02TD1278E:130b-27: aom badzra badzra la dzi hva la sogs pa sbyor bas ngag rdo rjer bsams pa dang /
T02TD1278E:130b-28: aom he badzra yo ga raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1278E:130b-30: sems rdo rje'i rnam par song bar bsams pa ni sems srung ba'o //
T02TD1278E:130b-31: de nas mchod pa thams cad la dmigs nas /
T02TD1278E:130b-32: aom badzra pu shpe a'a: h'um zhes pa la sogs pa gang du brjod cing me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri chab dang lha bshos rnams so so'i rdzas bsnams par byin gyis brlab la /
T02TD1278E:130b-33: mchod yon la dza: h'um bam ho: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1278E:131a-0: zhabs ba sil la ni ri ti kham @131a * //
T02TD1278E:131a-2: zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs nas tshogs kyi lha spyan drang ba ni /
T02TD1278E:131a-3: lus kyis rdo rje dril bu gzung nas /
T02TD1278E:131a-5: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD1278E:131a-6: rdo rje mi phyed ci bzhed pa //
T02TD1278E:131a-7: mchog tu dgyes par gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1278E:131a-8: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1278E:131a-9: zhes brjod la bsam pas snying ga'i padma'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas /
T02TD1278E:131a-10: 'od kyis bla ma dang kye'i rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02TD1278E:131a-11: de la mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD1278E:131a-12: gdan rnams phul la mandala gyi steng du bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD1278E:131a-13: de nas dang po'i bla ma'i smin mtshams su shes pa gtad la bla ma la phyag bya ba dang /
T02TD1278E:131a-15: de nas yid kyis gtso bo'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs la lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa dag par bsam pa dang /
T02TD1278E:131a-18: de nas mchod par dbul ba ni /
T02TD1278E:131a-19: dang po mi'i mchod pa rdzas rim par bshams pa yod na de dbul /
T02TD1278E:131a-20: med na rang gi snying ga nas phyi'i mchod pa'i lha mo sprul la dbul /
T02TD1278E:131a-22: chu dang thang las skyes pa yi //
T02TD1278E:131a-23: lha rdzas bzang po'i me tog 'di //
T02TD1278E:131a-24: gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1278E:131a-25: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1278E:131a-27: lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi //
T02TD1278E:131a-28: lha rdzas bzang po'i bdug spos 'di //
T02TD1278E:131a-29: gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1278E:131a-30: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1278E:131a-32: gdon rnams rab 'joms shis pa yi //
T02TD1278E:131a-33: dge zhing mun sel mar me 'di //
T02TD1278E:131a-34: gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1278E:131a-35: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1278E:131a-37: nags tshal chu ni yid 'ong ba'i //
T02TD1278E:131a-38: dri zhim chu yi lha yi chu //
T02TD1278E:131a-39: gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1278E:131a-40: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1278E:131a-42: sman rnams bcud ni yid 'ong ba'i //
T02TD1278E:131a-43: sngags kyi zhal zas bshos 'di dag / gus pas mchog gis bdag 'bul na //
T02TD1278E:131a-44: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1278E:131b-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta nee wi dye p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes pas mchod @131b pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1278E:131b-1: da ni nang gi mchod pa ni rang gi snying ga nas /
T02TD1278E:131b-2: lha mo brgyad spros pa ni /
T02TD1278E:131b-3: goo r'i byang chub sems dkar po thogs pa /
T02TD1278E:131b-4: tsoo r'i byang chub sems dmar po thogs pa /
T02TD1278E:131b-5: bet'a l'i dri chu thogs pa /
T02TD1278E:131b-7: tsandal'i cang te'u brdung ba spros la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1278E:131b-8: gsang ba'i mchod pa ni rang gi snying ga nas lha mo dombi n'i spros nas /
T02TD1278E:131b-9: yum bdag med ma dang gnyis med du bstim la mchod do //
T02TD1278E:131b-10: de'i dus su ngag tu 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD1278E:131b-11: goo r'i ma ni ri bong 'dzin /
T02TD1278E:131b-12: tsoo r'i ma ni nyi ma 'dzin /
T02TD1278E:131b-13: bee t'a l'i ni rdo rje chu /
T02TD1278E:131b-16: ri khrod ma ni sbrang tsi 'dzin //
T02TD1278E:131b-17: gtum mo cang te'u sgra brdung zhing //
T02TD1278E:131b-18: g-yung mo mgul pa dag la 'khyud //
T02TD1278E:131b-19: 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa //
T02TD1278E:131b-20: skyes bu bzhin du byed par shog / phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum //
T02TD1278E:131b-21: 'di dag gsum gyis gtso bo mchod //
T02TD1278E:131b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um sv'a h'a h'am /
T02TD1278E:131b-23: de nas sdig pa bshags pa ni /
T02TD1278E:131b-24: bdag gi sdig pa bgyis pa dang //
T02TD1278E:131b-25: rjes su yi rang bgyid stsal gang //
T02TD1278E:131b-26: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga 'dir //
T02TD1278E:131b-27: thams cad ma lus so sor bshags //
T02TD1278E:131b-28: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang //
T02TD1278E:131b-29: 'phags pa rang rgyal nyan thos dang //
T02TD1278E:131b-30: so so skye bo'i tshogs rnams la //
T02TD1278E:131b-31: gus pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02TD1278E:131b-32: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog / de yis gsungs pa'i dam chos dang //
T02TD1278E:131b-33: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun la //
T02TD1278E:131b-34: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1278E:131b-35: bdag gi sbyin pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1278E:131b-36: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
T02TD1278E:131b-37: rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i //
T02TD1278E:131b-38: lam ni yang dag bsten par bgyi //
T02TD1278E:131b-39: bdag gi dge ba 'di dag kun //
T02TD1278E:131b-40: bla med byang chub yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1278E:131b-41: sems can kun don phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1278E:131b-42: mi gnas mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD1278E:131b-43: bdag gi dge ba 'di dag kun //
T02TD1278E:131b-44: yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas ni //
T02TD1278E:131b-45: sems can kun dang thun mong du //
T02TD1278E:131b-46: yongs su smin cing rdzogs par shog / ces brjod la /
T02TD1278E:132a-1: chub sems dpa' dang dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa la /
T02TD1278E:132a-3: bdag dus thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad du bzhes su gsol /
T02TD1278E:132a-4: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis /
T02TD1278E:132a-5: dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub stsal du gsol /
T02TD1278E:132a-6: de nas sdom pa bzung nas bstod pa nyi shu pas bstod la /
T02TD1278E:132a-8: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02TD1278E:132a-10: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod nas smon lam gdab pa ni rigs su skye zhing dam tshig can //
T02TD1278E:132a-11: smyo med kyi yi rdo rje ston //
T02TD1278E:132a-12: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //
T02TD1278E:132a-13: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02TD1278E:132a-14: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang //
T02TD1278E:132a-15: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can //
T02TD1278E:132a-16: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / de nas gshegs su gsol ba ni //
T02TD1278E:132a-17: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD1278E:132a-18: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD1278E:132a-19: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1278E:132a-20: slar yang byan par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1278E:132a-21: zhes brjod la he badzra mandala mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1278E:132a-22: mdor bsdus pa'i bya ba rdzogs so//
